headline: Assurant Q4 Earnings & Revenues Surpass Estimates, Premiums Rise Y/Y
summary: AIZ's Q4 results reflect higher adjusted EBITDA, growth at Homeowners as well as across various specialty Homeowners products and Connected Living growth in mobile.
